Q.1 I don\'t remember my password?

A.1 You have already created an account but you can\'t remember your password? Click on \'Login/Sign Up\' at the top of the page. Then click on \'Forgot Password?\'. Fill out your phone number and a password recovery will be sent to you by phone.
Q.2 How can I create an account?

A.2 Click on \'Login and Sign up\' at the top of the page. Then fill out your information in the \'Create an account\' section and click the \'Sign Up\' button. You can also create an account directly after placing an order. Your delivery address and the order details will then be saved in your account.
Q.3 What are your delivery hours?
A.3 Our delivery hour is from 10:00 AM to 08:00 PM.
Q.4 How much time it takes to deliver the order?
A.4 Generally it takes between 45 minutes to 1 hour time to deliver the order. Due to long distance or heavy traffic, delivery might take few extra minutes.
Q.5 Can I order from any location?
A.5 We will deliver to any limited listed area of Bhubaneswar Initially, we will be serving at the main Old Bhubaneswar area and not to old Bhopal area.
Q.6 Do you support bulk orders?
A.6 In order to provide all customers with a great selection and to ensure on-time delivery of your meal, we request you to order bulk quantity at least 24 hours in advance.
Q.7 Do I have to create an account to place an order?

A.7 Creating an account is mandatory, but you can see order without having to sign up. We make sure that ordering food online at Bliss Meal delivery is quick and fuss-free. After placing your order, you will have the option of creating an account.
